item.title: Hugo Layouts
item.description: Layout Index.html First layout to pay attention is the one under the folder layouts/index.html If you need to edit that layout yu can make a copy from themes/whatevertheme/layouts/index.html folder in layouts/index.html Let’s say that your content is shown in 3 columns (size of 4 each one) to 4 Columns (size of 3 each) you can chang as follows <!-- topic-item --> {{ range (where .Site.Pages "Type" "docs") }} <div class="col-lg-3 col-sm-6 mb-4"> Custom CSS You can use your own css files to override de css in use.
